message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Can you meet me at that price?

I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $12,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to come down to $13,000. This product truly delivers exceptional value, and I'm confident you'll see a great return on your investment.
I appreciate you coming down to $13,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,500?
Bob, I'm trying to be flexible, but I need to be fair to myself on this deal. $12,750 is my final offer.  I believe this product will exceed your expectations and provide significant value.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $12,625. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
